# abortParsing()

**Instance Method**

Stops the parser object.

## Declaration

```swift
func abortParsing()
```

## Discussion

If you invoke this method, the delegate, if it implements [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLParserDelegate/parser(_:parseErrorOccurred:)], is informed of the cancelled parsing operation.

## Parsing

- **parse()**: Starts the event-driven parsing operation.
- **parserError**: An [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] object from which you can obtain information about a parsing error.
